q: MUSIC mogul Simon Cowell has confessed he learnt nothing at school. Instead he taught himself and relied on "instincts" to amass a Â£ 165million fortune. He said: I never really had a proper education. I wasn't born with any skill. I didn't learn anything from school. "Mainly, I trust my instincts because I have very broad tastes. "We are already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. The 19 year Microsoft veteran will take the reigns Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platforms from outgoing president Bob Muglia. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness. "This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to institutions resilient enough to lead America back," he will say, according to prepared remarks. I believe those are the institutions of faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism. Mike Pence 's speech is likely to fuel further talk of a run for the White House or the governor's mansion in Indiana.
